metadata.title: CVE-2017-7379 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The PoDoFo::PdfSimpleEncoding::ConvertToEncoding function in PdfEncoding.cpp in PoDoFo 0.9.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted PDF document. Agostino Sarubbo discovered that PoDoFo mishandled certain crafted PDF files, resulting in an invalid read. If PoDoFo were to open a malicious PDF, an attacker could cause PoDoFo to crash or possibly leak sensitive information.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-9').
